post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, December 8
post.Content:
A quiet week this week, but a few good links nonetheless. Enjoy :-)

JavaFX

  • Johan Vos has posted an early access build of JavaFX 8u40 for Android. There are some very nice features in this release, so get exploring! :-)
  • Gerrit Grunwald has posted another of his 'Friday Fun Components' - this week it is a traffic light component.
  • Matthieu Brouillard has posted about external DI management with Afterburner.FX.
  • The SnapCode blog has a post on how to automatically update your JavaFX applications by running a small bootstrap program before your main application.
  • IDR Solutions has posted a YouTube video introducing their open source JavaFX PDF Viewer.

That's that for another week. Catch you all in a weeks time! :-)
